pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, December 2, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Vancouver, British Columbia

Private meetings

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of British Columbia, David Eby.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister, along with Minister of Families, Children and Social Development, Karina Gould, will join the Premier of British Columbia, David Eby, and British Columbia Minister of State for Child Care, Katrina Chen, to highlight the government’s plan to make child care more affordable for families in British Columbia. A media availability will follow.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:15 a.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
